p:
The title compound was prepared using the procedure described in Example 2, Step 2 replacing 2,5 dichlorobenzylamine with 2-amino-1-phenylethanol. 1H NMR (DMSO-d6, 400MHz) δ 9.17 (1H, d, J=4.2Hz), 9.08 (1H, br s), 8.91 (1H, s), 8.61 (1H, d, J=8.4Hz), 7.84 (1H, dd, J=4.4 and 8.2Hz), 7.42 (2H, d, J=7.2Hz), 7.35 (2H, t, J=7.4Hz), 7.26 (1H, t, J=7.2Hz), 4.88 (1H, dd, J=4.6 and 8.1Hz), 3.4-3.7 (2H, m)ppm.
FAB MS calcd for C 17H 15N 3O 3 310.1 (MH +), found 310.1.
